chapter.title: Requirements
chapter.para: To run the Purifinity client the following requirements are needed:

section.title: Hardware
section.para: The following hardware is needed as minimum and recommendation.

listitem.para: 64bit Intel compatible multi-core CPU (Purifinity is multi-core optimized, the more cores are available the faster analyses and evaluations are performed).
4GB of RAM (the more cores are available the more RAM is needed due to analyses and evaluations which are performed in parallel)
Plenty of disk space (>100GB) for trend charts
Full HD screen resolution of 1920x1080 for comfortable charting and full usage of complex perspectives

section.title: Operating System and Software

listitem.para: 32bit or 64bit version of Linux or Windows (only 64bit versions are tested, but 32bit versions should run without issues due to usage of Java)
A suitable Java 7 for the used OS needs to be installed and available for the user who runs Purifinity

section.para: As soon as these requirements are met, you can proceed with the installation of the client.
